attributes.action: Have All Bus Stops Placed Off Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to have a law where all bus stops are placed off road and ban all Kerb Side Bus Stops, This would not only be safer for other road user`s  but also help with traffic flow. Bus Bays where two or more Buses park for a long duration must be parked off road and not obstruct other road user`s.
